description: Manchester City: Your views on Community Shield defeat
title: Manchester City: Your views on Community Shield defeat
title_page: Manchester City: Your views on Community Shield defeat - BBC Sport
maintext:
Manchester City lost to Arsenal in the Community Shield at Wembley - the Gunners were victorious in a penalty shootout after the match finished 1-1 at full-time.
What did you make of City's performance? Who stood out and what needs to improve?
